summary: This document is a chain of emails from February 2021 between FBI agents, primarily from the New York Field Office and an unspecified field office (DN), coordinating the scheduling of an interview with a victim of Jeffrey Epstein. The emails discuss logistical details, including time zones and the provision of trauma-focused therapy resources for the victim.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: Primary correspondent in the email chain, coordinating the interview with an Epstein victim and discussing therapy resources.

connections.person1: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office
connections.description: Both are FBI agents involved in the Epstein case, with SA being suggested as a contact for coordinating victim interview details.

events.title: Scheduled Interview with Epstein Victim
events.description: FBI agents confirm an interview is scheduled with an Epstein victim for the following morning at 10:30 AM.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office

events.title: Request for Victim Therapy Resources
events.description: An FBI agent from New York reaches out to a colleague regarding an Epstein victim who has resurfaced and is asking for a trauma-focused therapist, seeking office locations near the victim.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office

locations: M (possibly a location or office designation)
keyFacts: FBI agents were actively coordinating an interview with an Epstein victim as of February 2021.
The victim had previously been assisted by the FBI and resurfaced requesting trauma-focused therapy.
The communication shows ongoing investigative and victim support efforts related to the Epstein case years after his death.
Logistical details such as time zones (EST) and specific meeting times (10:30 AM) were being coordinated between field offices.
The email chain references prior assistance provided to the victim 'last year' (likely 2020), indicating sustained contact.
